title: About
body:
Hello, my name is James. I am a student, and a front-end intern at software company as well.
I got exposure to front-end engineering serendipity, and it fascinates me a lot. I write down what I have seen and heard in my website. The majority of the posts are related to my working experiences. If you have any question, please feel free to contact me. <3

title: test
description: Guide d'utilisation des emoji dans Hugo
body: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
